      • createProfile

        Profile createProfile(String name,
                    String description,
                    String iconPath)
                      throws AlreadyExistsException,
                             CreationException
        Create a new profile
        Parameters:
        name - the profile name
        description - the profile description
        iconPath - the profile icon path
        Returns:
        The new created profile
        Throws:
        CreationException - errors thrown if can't create the new profile
        AlreadyExistsException
        Since:
        6.0

      • exportAllProfiles

        byte[] exportAllProfiles()
                         throws ExecutionException
        Export all profiles from DataBase to XML file
        Returns:
        the content of the xml file containing all profiles
        Throws:
        ExecutionException - errors thrown if can't export profiles
        Since:
        6.0

      • exportProfilesWithIdsSpecified

                                      throws ExecutionException
        Export specific profiles from DataBase to XML file
        Parameters:
        profileIds - profile identifiers to export
        Returns:
        the content of the xml file containing profiles to export
        Throws:
        ExecutionException - errors thrown if can't export profiles
        Since:
        6.0

      • importProfilesUsingSpecifiedPolicy

        List<String> importProfilesUsingSpecifiedPolicy(byte[] xmlContent,
                                              ImportPolicy policy)
                                                throws ExecutionException
        Import profiles from XML file.
        Parameters:
        xmlContent - xml content to import
        policy - import policy to define different way how to import xml content in different case
        Returns:
        a List is a warning message list in case of non-existing User, Group or Role to map the profile to.
        Throws:
        ExecutionException - errors thrown if can't import profiles
        Since:
        6.0

                    ProfileUpdater updater)
                      throws ProfileNotFoundException,
                             UpdateException

        Parameters:
        id - the profile id to update
        updater - including new value of all attributes adaptable
        Returns:
        the updated Profile.
        Throws:
        UpdateException - errors thrown if can't update profiles
        ProfileNotFoundException

      • createProfileEntry

        ProfileEntry createProfileEntry(ProfileEntryCreator creator)
                                throws AlreadyExistsException,
                                       CreationException
        Create a new profile entry
        Parameters:
        creator - fields to initialize. The type value must be "folder" or "link". If type = "link", the page is also mandatory.
        Returns:
        The created profile entry
        Throws:
        CreationException - errors thrown if can't create the new profile entry
        AlreadyExistsException
        Since:
        6.0

      • createProfileEntry

        ProfileEntry createProfileEntry(String name,
                              String description,
                              long profileId,
                              String type)
                                throws AlreadyExistsException,
                                       CreationException
        Create a new profile entry
        Parameters:
        name - the profile entry name
        description - the profile entry description
        profileId - the linked profile id
        type - the value must be "folder" or "link". If type = "link", the page parameter.
        Returns:
        The created profile entry
        Throws:
        CreationException - errors thrown if can't create the new profile entry
        AlreadyExistsException
        Since:
        6.0

      • createProfileEntry

        ProfileEntry createProfileEntry(String name,
                              String description,
                              long profileId,
                              String type,
                              String page)
                                throws AlreadyExistsException,
                                       CreationException
        Create a new profile entry
        Parameters:
        name - the profile entry name
        description - the profile entry description
        profileId - the linked profile id
        type - the value must be "folder" or "link". If type = "link", the page parameter.
        page - token of the linked page
        Returns:
        The created profile entry
        Throws:
        CreationException - errors thrown if can't create the new profile entry
        AlreadyExistsException
        Since:
        6.0

                        throws DeletionException

        the updated profile entry
